videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Playing every classic Midrange card.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a Jund midrange Delirium deck, featuring Winter, Misanthropic Guide as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro 
02:09 - Deck Tech
08:09 - vs Keranos, God of Storms
21:19 - vs Abuelo, Ancestral Echo
25:21 - vs Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
29:10 - vs Jin-Gitaxias
33:17 - vs Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
38:59 - vs Huatli, Poet of Unity
46:38 - vs Abomination of Llanowar
52:25 - vs Muldrotha, the Gravetide
56:50 - vs Purphoros, Bronze-Blooded

Decklist:
